briefTitle: MK0507A Clinical Study in Patients With Glaucoma and Ocular Hypertension (0507A-149)(COMPLETED)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients with glaucoma and ocular hypertension

Exclusion Criteria:

* History of ocular surgery within 3 months
* Administration contradiction to timolol and dorzolamide

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Intraocular Pressure (IOP) From Baseline at 8 Weeks
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline to 8 weeks in Intraocular Pressure (IOP) assessed 2 hours after ocular instillation (at Hour 2)

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change From Baseline in Intraocular Pressure (IOP) at 8 Weeks
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent Change from baseline to 8 weeks in Intraocular Pressure (IOP) assessed 2 hours after ocular instillation (at Hour 2)

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change From Baseline in Outflow Pressure Reduction Rate at 8 Weeks
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent Change from baseline to 8 weeks in Outflow Pressure Reduction Rate assessed 2 hours after ocular instillation (at Hour 2)
